= The Welkin Standard =

This is the official repository
for the Welkin standard.

== Project Organization ==
* [[standard]]: contains the text written form
  of the Welkin Standard.
** Each subfolder uses ISO 639-3 codes 
   for translations of the Standard. 
** The base specification is English,
   contained in [[standard/eng]].

== Tools ==

For details on running tools for the Standard, 
please see [[tools]].
